all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Therefore, what I say unto one I say unto all: Watch, for the adversary spreadeth his dominions, and darkness reigneth;
Doctrine and Covenants 82:5
Quote of the Day
"To all who are longing for faith, we invite you to come back. I promise your faith can be strengthened as you once again worship."
Elder S. Mark Palmer | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
